job.title: Software Engineer II
job.description:
In this role, you should have excellent problem-solving skills and thorough knowledge of Android Device Architecture. Communication and documentation are key to this role as you will be working directly with the architecture and management teams.     - Understanding of Android Device Architecture. Focused on Kernel, HAL, Debug   
  - Read requirements predominantly related to Hardware peripherals, Integrate, provide HAL interface to Application   
  - We expect at least 50-60% of tasks will be related to coding   
  - Previous knowledge on any device development is a plus      
Preferred Education     - Bachelor's Degree required or equivalent experience   
  - Minimum of 5+ years of experience      
Key Skills And Competencies     - Device Driver and Hardware Abstraction Layer development   
  - Knowledge of Linux Kernel, Bootloaders   
  - Hands on Experience in development using any one of the languages C,C++, JAVA   
  - Excellent communication skills   
  - Experience with Android Development   
  - Demonstrated technical experience   
  - Demonstrated experience working independently and collaboratively on projects   
  - Demonstrated experience trouble shooting   
  - Broad knowledge of applicable IT systems/applications   
  - Experience developing new systems and tools   
  - Experience in documenting and maintaining up to date systems procedures   
  - Advanced analytical skills
